definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: All Theatre Art Association's Co Artistic Director, Hoi Chiu.
sentences.chinese: 全劇場藝術總監海潮演出風格獨特的沙畫。

sentences.english: Greek peninsula and Avon Olivia island ocean tide with fierce changeful between famous in the world.
sentences.chinese: 希臘半島與埃維亞島之間的海潮以兇猛多變聞名於世。

sentences.english: In the harsh growing environment, it absorbs the sea fog and tides nutrients thrive.
sentences.chinese: 在嚴峻生長環境下，它吸收海霧和海潮的養份茁壯。

sentences.english: Life gose on we must face to the sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 對我們的生活海潮必須面對陽光。

sentences.english: For five days it rose and fell with swells and generated around 10 kilowatts of power.
sentences.chinese: 連續五天，它隨着海潮起伏，發出10千瓦左右的電。

definition: to beat against the shore (of waves)
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
spray/ocean spray/spindrift/fig. happenings from one's life/CL:朵[duo3]
